CustomField.description: Opportunity Owner's team, derived from Owner's Role.
CustomField.formula: CASE(Owner.Role_Name__c, "Sales Manager, Software Core (A)", "Core (A)", "AE, CASEpeer Core(A)", "Core ( A)", "AE, Docketwise Core(A)", "Core(A)", "AE, MyCase Core (A)", "Core (A)", "Sales Manager, Software Core (B)", "Core (B)", "AE, CASEpeer Core (B)", "Core (B)", "AE, Docketwise Core (B)", "Core (B)", "AE, MyCase Core (B)", "Core (B)", "Sales Manager, Software Core (C)", "Core (C)", "AE, CASEpeer Core (C)", "Core (C)", "AE, Docketwise Core (C)", "Core (C)", "AE, MyCase Core (C)", "Core (C)", "Sales Manager, Software Core (D)", "Core (D)", "AE, CASEpeer Core (D)", "Core (D)", "AE, Docketwise Core (D)", "Core (D)", "AE, MyCase Core (D)", "Core (D)", "AE, CASEpeer Mid-Market", "Mid-Market", "AE, Docketwise Mid- Market", "Mid-Market", "AE, MyCase Mid-Market", "Mid-Market", "AE, MyCase Special Operations", "Special Operations", "")
CustomField.label: Owner Team
